{"metadata":{"objective":"Body paragraphs for an essay","lastStepAudioPath":""},"steps":[{"headerText":"A paragraph is not enough!","leftText":"<p><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>You are</strong></span> writing a paragraph about the worst meal you ever cooked in an effort to get invited to appear on <em>America&#39;s Worst&nbsp;Cooks</em>.<span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 18.4px; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; display: inline !important; float: none; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>You keep remembering how many mistakes you made in your fruitless quest to make Chinese hot and sour soup, and you decide&nbsp;to add more information to your letter.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Your next step</strong></span> is to revise your paragraph to include your additional details and make it work as part of a longer piece of writing.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;font-size:15px;\"><strong>Try it!</strong></span><br /><br /><span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\"><span style=\"color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;\">Note for screen readers: Press Alt + 1 , or option + 1 on Mac, to open the try it information box in a new window and access information needed to answer some of the questions. In the content, this needed information is described as being in the box or table to the right.</span></span></p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">More mistakes I made . . .</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">I thought I was going to a Chinese grocery, but it was an Indian grocery.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">I finally found a Chinese grocery, but I got a flat tire on the way there.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">The grocery did not stock two of the ingredients I needed, so I ordered them from the Internet.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">When the ingredients came in the mail, they were old and stale.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">I read the recipe wrong so at first I used corn syrup instead of cornstarch.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">The soup was supposed to be a warm, inviting brown color, but it was black and looked dirty.</span></p><p><span class=\"ju-arch-daughter\" style=\"font-family:architects daughter,serif;font-size:15px;\">As a person of Italian heritage, I thought I&#39;d add some pasta.&nbsp; Bad idea.</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","settings":{"showHeader":1,"showAudio":1,"audioPath":"","hideRightPanel":0,"showNext":1,"delayStep":"0","delayRight":"0","showRFB":0}},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>When you have a lot to say, you need to write a longer piece of writing, such as an essay or a longer letter.</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Structuring a longer piece of writing"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>A longer piece of writing includes the following:<br />&nbsp;</p><ul style=\"padding-left: 15px;\"><li>an introduction<br />&nbsp;</li><li>body paragraphs<br />&nbsp;</li><li>a conclusion<br />&nbsp;</li></ul>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows the parts of a longer piece of writing: the introductory paragraph, 3 body paragraphs, and the concluding paragraph.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Which of the elements of a longer piece of writing has more than one paragraph?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_68f3e093-97fc-ac2d-f6b1-03d66aaef05e\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_68f3...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"rightText":null,"leftText":"<p>When you are&nbsp;writing one paragraph, the single paragraph contains all the needed parts: a topic sentence to introduce what you are writing about, details, and a concluding sentence.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>In a longer piece of writing:<br />&nbsp;</p><ul style=\"padding-left: 15px;\"><li>the introductory paragraph introduces what you are writing about.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>supporting details go&nbsp;in one or more&nbsp;body paragraphs.<br />&nbsp;</li><li>the concluding sentence goes in&nbsp;a concluding paragraph.<br />&nbsp;</li></ul>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows how the 3 parts of a paragraph correspond to the parts of a longer piece of writing.  A paragraph's topic sentence corresponds to a longer piece of writing's introductory paragraph.  A paragraph's supporting details correspond to the body paragraphs of a longer piece of writing. A paragraph's concluding sentence corresponds to a longer piece of writing's concluding paragraph. \" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>In a longer piece of writing, where is the concluding sentence found?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_79376bdd-5493-492b-eb7d-baf799f2859a\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_7937...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>The module <em>Writing to Win</em> explains how to write a five paragraph essay including details about writing an introductory paragraph and a conclusion.<br /><br />This mini-lesson covers the differences between a single, standalone paragraph and the body paragraphs of an essay.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"rightText":null,"leftText":"<p>In a longer piece of writing, you use body paragraphs to organize, develop, and share&nbsp;your ideas.</p>","headerText":"Body paragraphs"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Each body paragraph is part of the whole and covers a single point, or idea.<br /><br />Each body paragraph has&nbsp;a topic sentence that describes the idea&nbsp;and details that support the topic sentence.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows the 2 parts of a body paragraph in a longer piece of writing.  The first part is the topic sentence for a single idea. The 2nd part is the supporting details for the topic sentence.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>","headerText":""},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>Which of the following is NOT true of body paragraphs in a longer piece of writing?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_c6986020-eaf5-ecb8-346d-f8f414ba8fe1\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_c698...</strong></jumc><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":0},"leftText":"<p>In a standalone paragraph, the topic sentence names the topic and the main idea and gives&nbsp;the reader information about the writer&#39;s plan.<br /><br />In your original letter to the producers of <em>America&#39;s Worst Cooks</em>, which had only one paragraph,&nbsp;the topic sentence named the one topic you wanted to write about: the story of your attempt to make Chinese hot and sour soup.<br />&nbsp;</p><table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 90%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">Dear Producers:<br />&nbsp;</p><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\"><span class=\"marker\">The story of my attempt to make Chinese hot and sour soup makes me a perfect fit for <em><span style=\"font-family:Times\">America&rsquo;s Worst Cooks</span></em>. </span>First, I searched the Internet for an authentic recipe. Second, I had to find a Chinese grocery store to purchase the ingredients. Next, once I had all the ingredients, I began combining them in a large pot. For some reason, the soup was not thickening. I re-read the recipe and thought there was a typo, so I added two additional <em><span style=\"font-family:Times\">tablespoons</span></em> of cornstarch. When the soup still did not thicken, I added two additional <em><span style=\"font-family:Times\">cups</span></em> of cornstarch. While I stirred, suddenly the soup turned into a solid brick and my spoon froze in the middle of it. Finally, I had to throw the entire batch into the garbage can, including the pot. I learned a valuable lesson, though: An amateur shouldn&rsquo;t think he knows better than the person who created the recipe. Doesn&rsquo;t this experience make me a truly awful cook who should be on your show?<br />&nbsp;</p><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">Sincerely,<br />Awful Cook<br />&nbsp;</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Topic sentence and supporting details for a body paragraph"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Looking at your original letter and the list of additional mistakes shown to the right, you realize that you can break your story down into details about two general topics.&nbsp;<br /><br />Based on the list at the right, which TWO general areas do you want to talk about?</p><p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_eb4e4dcc-b0e8-b0be-7e91-61b26ce31395\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\"><strong>ID: mc_eb4e...</strong></jumc></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"rightText":null,"leftText":"<p>In a body paragraph that is part of a longer piece of writing, the topic sentence names one idea of several that the writer will write about.</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>The other ideas will appear in their own paragraphs.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows how the ideas in the topic sentence of a standalone paragraph correspond to a longer piece of writing. Each idea from the topic sentence of a standalone paragraph becomes it's own topic sentence for a body paragraph in a longer piece of writing.\" src=\"data:image/png;base64,\" /></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Each of the areas that you want to write about will be a topic of one of the body paragraphs in&nbsp;your new expanded letter.</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>What will your first body paragraph be about?<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_59234ab0-75c5-a54f-0655-d2bfe9a266c2\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_5923...</strong></jumc></p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Given your topic of the <strong>mistakes you made while shopping for ingredients</strong>, what is the best topic sentence for your first body paragraph?<br /><br /><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_db3795e4-62ac-8267-5bd5-b9058bbd5c1d\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_db37...</strong></jumc></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Based on your list of additional mistakes, which THREE details fall under the category of <strong>mistakes you made while shopping for ingredients</strong>?&nbsp; You will use these as details in your first body paragraph.<br /><br /><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_abd327ca-807c-935f-f1a3-12c79f74eac8\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\"><strong>ID: mc_abd3...</strong></jumc></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your new first body paragraph starts with your topic sentence about the mistakes you made while shopping for ingredients, and includes details that support this topic from your list:<br />&nbsp;</p><table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 90%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p>The problems started before I began cooking; they began when I tried to shop for the ingredients.&nbsp; I thought I was going to a Chinese grocery, but it was an Indian grocery.&nbsp; I finally found a Chinese grocery, but I got a flat tire on the way there.&nbsp; The Chinese grocery did not stock two of the ingredients I needed, so I ordered them from the Internet.</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>The second area you want to write about is mistakes you made preparing the meal.</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>What is the best topic sentence for your second body paragraph?<br /><br /><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_ab172340-ba23-8551-ef19-66156f2a1162\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_ab17...</strong></jumc></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Based on your list, which THREE of the following details fall under the category of <strong>mistakes you made while preparing the meal</strong>?&nbsp; You will use these details in your second body paragraph.<br /><br /><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_3967da6f-5101-4f2d-4283-fe7f5df5e941\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\"><strong>ID: mc_3967...</strong></jumc></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your second body paragraph starts with your topic sentence about the mistakes you made while preparing the meal, and includes details that support this topic:<br />&nbsp;</p><table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 90%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p>Things went from bad to worse when I began trying to assemble the ingredients into a delicious soup.&nbsp; I read the recipe wrong so at first I used corn syrup instead of cornstarch.&nbsp; The soup was supposed to be a warm, inviting brown color, but it was black and looked dirty.&nbsp; As a person of Italian heritage, I thought I&#39;d add some pasta.&nbsp; Many writers include at least three pieces of support when planning an effective paragraph.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>A single paragraph uses<strong>&nbsp;transition words</strong> to help the reader understand the writer&#39;s plan and connect ideas clearly.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Transition words in a body paragraph"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Read your original letter carefully. Which FOUR transition words are used?<br />&nbsp;</p><table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 90%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">Dear Producers:<br />&nbsp;</p><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">The story of my attempt to make Chinese hot and sour soup makes me a perfect fit for <em><span style=\"font-family:Times\">America&rsquo;s Worst Cooks</span></em>. I learned a valuable lesson, though: An amateur shouldn&rsquo;t think he knows better than the person who created the recipe. Next, once I had all the ingredients, I began combining them in a large pot. For some reason, the soup was not thickening. I re-read the recipe and thought there was a typo, so I added two additional <em><span style=\"font-family:Times\">tablespoons</span></em> of cornstarch. When the soup still did not thicken, I added two additional <em><span style=\"font-family:Times\">cups</span></em> of cornstarch. While I stirred, suddenly the soup turned into a solid brick and my spoon froze in the middle of it. Finally, I had to throw the entire batch into the garbage can, including the pot. I learned a valuable lesson, though: An amateur shouldn&rsquo;t think he knows better than the person who created the recipe. Doesn&rsquo;t this experience make me a truly awful cook who should be on your show?<br />&nbsp;</p><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">Sincerely,<br />Awful Cook</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p><br /><jumc ju-mc=\"mc_1f67b737-0830-c466-4bf1-3cb396d6f5e8\" style=\"width: 200px; background: rgb(163, 228, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-user-select: none;\">MC Placeholder<br /><strong>ID: mc_1f67...</strong></jumc></p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>A body paragraph does not need a concluding sentence.&nbsp; It is part of a longer piece of writing that includes a full paragraph as a conclusion.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows the 2 parts of a body paragraph in a longer piece of writing.  The first part is the topic sentence for a single idea. The 2nd part is the supporting details for the topic sentence. They do not need concluding sentences.<br />&nbsp;</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your next step is revising.&nbsp;&nbsp;When you are revising, make sure&nbsp;each&nbsp;body paragraph meets these&nbsp;criteria:<br />&nbsp;</p><ul style=\"padding-left: 15px;\"><li>covers just one of the ideas that is mentioned in the introductory paragraph</li><li>starts with a topic sentence that names the idea</li><li>has enough details to support the topic sentence</li><li>includes details that all stick to&nbsp;the topic</li><li>transitions smoothly from the paragraph before it<br />&nbsp;</li></ul>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Revising a body paragraph"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>When you review the first body paragraph, you decide that it meets the criteria, but that you have forgotten to include these details from your original letter and your list of additional details.<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">I searched the Internet for an authentic recipe.&nbsp; paragraph letter:</strong><br />&nbsp;</p><table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p>Dear Producers:<br /><br />The story of my attempt to make Chinese hot and sour soup makes me a perfect fit for <em>America&rsquo;s Worst Cooks</em>. First, I searched the Internet for an authentic recipe. Second, I had to find a Chinese grocery store to purchase the ingredients. Next, once I had all the ingredients, I began combining them in a large pot. For some reason, the soup was not thickening. I re-read the recipe and thought there was a typo, so I added two additional <em>tablespoons</em> of cornstarch. When the soup still did not thicken, I added two additional <em>cups</em> of cornstarch. While I stirred, suddenly the soup turned into a solid brick and my spoon froze in the middle of it. Finally, I had to throw the entire batch into the garbage can, including the pot. I learned a valuable lesson, though: An amateur shouldn&rsquo;t think he knows better than the person who created the recipe. Doesn&rsquo;t this experience make me a truly awful cook who should be on your show?<br /><br />Sincerely,</p><p>Awful Cook</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p><strong>Expanded letter:</strong><br />&nbsp;</p><table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p>Dear Producers:<br />&nbsp;</p><p>The story of my attempt to make Chinese hot and sour soup makes me a perfect fit for <em>America&rsquo;s Worst Cooks</em>.&nbsp; As you read this application, you will hear the tale of a clueless cook who couldn&#39;t find a grocery store or the right ingredients, made a complete disaster of a meal, and learned a few lessons in the process.<br />&nbsp;</p><p>First, the problems started before I began cooking; they began when I tried to shop for the ingredients.&nbsp; At the outset, I searched the Internet for an authentic recipe.&nbsp; Then, I had to find a Chinese grocery to purchase all the ingredients.&nbsp; I thought I was going to a Chinese grocery, but it was an Indian grocery.&nbsp; I finally found a Chinese grocery, but I got a flat tire on the way there.&nbsp; The Chinese grocery did not stock two of the ingredients I needed, so I ordered them from the Internet.&nbsp; When the ingredients came in the mail, they were old and stale.<br />&nbsp;</p><p>Next, things went from bad to worse when I began trying to assemble the ingredients into a delicious soup. Once I had all the ingredients, I began combining them in a large pot.&nbsp; I read the recipe wrong so at first I used corn syrup instead of cornstarch.&nbsp; For some reason, the soup was not thickening.&nbsp; I re-read the recipe and thought there was a typo, so I added two additional <em>tablespoons</em> of cornstarch.&nbsp; The soup was supposed to be a warm, inviting brown color, but it was black and looked dirty.&nbsp; As a person of Italian heritage, I thought I&#39;d add some pasta.&nbsp; Bad idea.&nbsp; When the soup still did not thicken, I added two additional <em>cups</em> of cornstarch.&nbsp; While I stirred, suddenly the soup turned into a solid brick and my spoon froze in the middle of it.&nbsp; Finally, I had to throw the entire batch into the garbage can, including the pot.<br />&nbsp;</p><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">Through my horrible experience, I learned a valuable lesson: An amateur shouldn&rsquo;t think he knows better than the person who created the recipe. Doesn&rsquo;t this experience make me a truly awful cook who should be on your show?<br />&nbsp;</p><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">&nbsp;</p><p style=\"margin-top:.1pt;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:.1pt;margin-left:0in\">Sincerely,<br />Awful Cook</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null}],"overviewHeader":"Overview","inputData":{"mc_68f3e093-97fc-ac2d-f6b1-03d66aaef05e":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"body paragraphs","fixed":false,"correct":false},{"text":"introductory paragraph","fixed":false,"correct":false,"incFeedback":"A longer piece of writing has just one introductory paragraph."},{"fixed":false,"correct":false,"text":"concluding paragraph","incFeedback":"A longer piece of writing has just one concluding paragraph."},{"fixed":false,"correct":false,"text":""},{"fixed":false,"correct":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correctFeedback":"A longer piece of writing typically has more than one body paragraph.
